description:
Near the end of summer break, Renge goes on a camping trip with everyone from school. After setting up the tents, they all find their own ways to have fun, from tossing a ball to fishing. In the evening, they have a barbecue. The kids can`t resist eating too much of the delicious grilled meat and vegetables, and their teacher, Kazuho, has too much alcohol and gets drunk. In the morning, Renge and Natsumi decide to put out some syrup to attract rhinoceros beetles...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: みんなでキャンプに行った
